title: Peter Norvig

title: Peter Norvig - Wikipedia
snippet: Peter Norvig (born 14 December 1956) is an American computer scientist and Distinguished Education Fellow at the Stanford Institute for Human-Centered AI. He previously served as a director of research and search quality at Google. Norvig is the co-author with Stuart J. Russell of the most ...

title: Peter Norvig
snippet: Peter Norvig is a Director of Research at Google Inc; previously he directed Google's core search algorithms group.

title: Peter Norvig: Today's Most Pressing Questions in AI Are ...
snippet: Artificial intelligence expert Peter Norvig is joining the Stanford Institute for Human-Centered AI this fall as a Distinguished Education Fellow, with the task of developing tools and materials to explain the key concepts of artificial intelligence.
